projectsSection.cardFestalink: FestaLink is a full-stack SaaS built with Next.js and TypeScript that allows users to design animated, customizable invitation cards for kids’ parties, featuring parallax effects and shareable links.
projectsSection.cardDigitalDice: A fictional video game eCommerce created by me with React JS, Redux, TypeScript and Styled-Components. All the fictional games included are consumed from an API, and their images were generated by AI, with prompts that I provided.
projectsSection.cardVFOstudio: This is a portfolio page, an art and design studio created by me, where I promote my services and post my artworks. The idea is to be simple, yet artistic and inspiring, with attention to the details.
projectsSection.cardMyGoodChef: This eCommerce web app fetches data from a fake API, displaying restaurants and their menus, letting the users add items to the cart and checkout their purchase. All the images and some texts were generated by AI.
projectsSection.cardAvatarMaker: An interactive web application which I created the concept, developed all the code and the visual elements, including the digital illustration. You can create different avatars and save them (with the implementation of html2canvas).
projectsSection.cardWeatherApp: Requested by EBAC, an educational institution, the demand was to create a weather forecast web app with different functions in a team with six members (1 PO, 2 UI designers, 3 Devs), working with agile methodology.
projectsSection.cardMamiMoon: For this project I had to come up with all the UX/UI part, including the creation of the logo and the icons. Also, I decided the most appropriated technologies for an efficient, responsive and fast webpage, working on the SEO and keeping a high performance.
projectsSection.cardNumbersGame: This game is a personal project built entirely in Vanilla JavaScript, as a self challenge to test and improve my coding skills, creating all the logics, rules and challenges involved. All the visual elements were created by me.
projectsSection.cardVFOstories: A page with short stories illustrated by VFO Studio that include audio, listed through API data consumption. Animated parallax effects made with Parallax JS plugin.
projectsSection.cardVFOShop: This React page was created to promote VFO Studio's exclusive products. It has many reusable components, which is essential for the many product pages that follow the same structure. That way, it's very practical to add and manage new routes and items.
projectsSection.cardRiverCrossing: This is a classical logical reasoning puzzle, where you need to cross a river taking a few items to the opposite side, under some rules. All the graphics in this game were created by me with Krita, GIMP, and Inkscape. Made with Vanilla JavaScript.

aboutSection.aboutP1: My name is Victor Freire Oliveira and I am a creative Software Engineer from Maceió, AL - Brazil. My focus is frontend development, which means I build digital products that users see and interact with. Since I found out how fun coding can be, I started developing my skills and working on different personal projects and doing freelance services.
aboutSection.aboutP2: My experience started back in high school, learning HTML and CSS for fun, creating my own websites (old HotDog and Dreamweaver) about whatever subject I enjoyed. The following years I kept developing skills in different areas, including Graphic Design and digital art. Nowadays, I make use of all those skills to bring solution to people through technology, keeping curious and thirsty for learning new things and sharing my ideas.
